hero.title: Fanora Auctions
hero.subtitle: Bid on exclusive experiences and one-of-a-kind items from your favorite stars!

introduction.text: Welcome to Fanora Auctions! This is your chance to win unique interactions and memorabilia. Keep an eye on the countdown and place your bids. Highest bidder wins!

auctionItems.title: 15-Min Live Video Chat with Hania Aamir
auctionItems.description: An exclusive opportunity for a one-on-one video conversation with the vibrant Hania Aamir. Ask your questions and chat live!

auctionItems.title: Signed Cricket Bat by Babar Azam
auctionItems.description: Own a piece of cricket history! A full-sized cricket bat personally signed by the captain, Babar Azam.

auctionItems.title: Personalized Song by Atif Aslam
auctionItems.description: A once-in-a-lifetime chance! Atif Aslam will compose and record a 30-second original song personalized for you or a loved one.
